TunableList.name: IGNORE_TESTS
TunableList.description: Mapping of tag to tests used to bypass the use only status. SingelSimResolver on the sim is used.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The visual style of the balloon background.

TdescFragTag.name: value
TdescFragTag.description: Set of tests that must be passed for sim to ignore 'use only' status.

TunableList.name: TAGS_TO_CONVERT
TunableList.description: The tags that should automatically be converted from 'use preference' functionality to 'use only' functionality on load.
